message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $13,000. I believe this product would be highly valuable to you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However,  $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $11,500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $11,500. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $12,250. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
